column4: you see folks ... i'm just trying to find out a good solution to "my issue" ... i'd like to play a few games but also learn more about linux and some other stuff ... ... and i just hopped on to the wine-idea because someone mentioned it to me / i read a bit about it ... but i
but i am open for other solutions too :) ... dual-booting got a vote here too :)
it's all dependant on how the games you were planning to play work with wine
... like i said ... dual-booting is another option i'm still willing to take
